docs.lead_paragraph: It doesn't happen often--but sometimes I see an article so fine I want to preserve it in my files and show it to others.

headline.main: Letter to the Editor 16 -- No Title

docs.abstract: M D Rivkin lr comments that rev of MIT study The Limits to Growth has restored sanity to debate on future of world
